title: Understanding the Correlation Between Attitudes, Self-Esteem, and Loneliness in Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: Course supporting entry-level professional development in social fields for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of online learning attitudes on self-esteem formation.
Learners design strategies to enhance self-esteem by utilizing online interaction strategies.
Learners can suggest at least three strategies for managing loneliness in online learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
